plays.text: Goal scored by Alexei Zhamnov assisted by Steve Sullivan and Jon Klemm
Penalty to Chris Simon 2 minutes for Elbowing Chuck Kobasew
Goal scored by Chris Clark assisted by Blake Sloan and Stephane Yelle

Penalty to Scott Nichol 2 minutes for Charging Boris Mironov
Penalty to Craig Conroy 2 minutes for Crosschecking Steve Poapst
Penalty to Chris Simon 2 minutes for High Sticking Chuck Kobasew
Goal scored by Denis Gauthier assisted by Craig Conroy and Craig Berube
Goal scored by Chuck Kobasew assisted by Chris Drury and Petr Buzek
Penalty to Craig Berube 5 minutes for Fighting Jason Strudwick
Penalty to Petr Buzek 2 minutes for High Sticking Nathan Dempsey
Penalty to Jason Strudwick 2 minutes for Charging Petr Buzek
Penalty to Jason Strudwick 5 minutes for Fighting Craig Berube
Penalty to Stephane Yelle 2 minutes for Holding Alexei Zhamnov
Penalty to Scott Nichol 2 minutes for Roughing Steve Sullivan
